MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G11 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.31AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.26AM on 9th December 2020.
